example_quotes: Medical Student: OK, um has he brought up um any blood?
Patient: No.
Patient: Hi, um my son has just been sick over the past uh couple of days. He's just had this cough and uh stuffy nose...
Medical Student: OK, and so can you tell me a bit more about the cough, so it started um?
Patient: He's just had this cough and uh stuffy nose...
Patient: Yeah, so the cough started about a week ago and um his stuffy nose, he's sort of had a stuffy nose since around the same time...
Medical Student: OK, um has he brought up um any blood?
Patient: No.
Medical Student: Alright and has he had any problems with breathing.
Patient: No.
Medical Student: OK, um has he had a sore throat?
Patient: Um no.
Medical Student: Alright, um how about any changes to his sense of smell or or taste?
Patient: Uhm he, uh, he hasn't really, uh yeah, he hasn't said anything about that.
Medical Student: OK, um has he had a sore throat?
Patient: Um no.
Medical Student: OK, um have there been any um concerns with his growth and or development?
Patient: No.
Medical Student: How about any diarrhea?
Patient: Uh no.
Medical Student: Alright, um has he had any fevers or chills?
Patient: Uh yeah, he does have a fever, um 39.5 I checked yesterday.
Medical Student: Alright, um has he had any fevers or chills?
Patient: Uh yeah, he does have a fever, um 39.5 I checked yesterday.
Medical Student: OK and um has he had any muscle aches or body pains?
Patient: Uh, no, not really.
Medical Student: OK, um and um any reasons or concerns for um uh physical or emotional abuse in the home?
Patient: No.
Medical Student: OK, uh is that is that the first time that um he was noted to have a fever yesterday?
Patient: Okay, let's see.
Medical Student: And um how has his weight been over the last several months, has he been gaining weight OK still?
Patient: Oh yeah.
Medical Student: Alright, um has he had any wheezing?
Patient: No.
Medical Student: OK and um is, are there any exposures that um could've possibly caused a skin rash...
Patient: Um I don't think so.
Medical Student: OK And um how about any chest pain is he bringing up sputum?
Patient: No.
Medical Student: Um how about any changes to his appetite?
Patient: Um he's just been eating less since he's been feeling unwell.
Medical Student: Did he have uh, does he have any nausea or vomiting?
Patient: No.
Medical Student: Or or any urinary problems?
Patient: No, no.
